title: All Together Now: Fridays with The Moth - Maurice Ashley
description:
This week, a boy from Jamaica isn't so sure his new home is all that. This week’s episode of All Together Now is hosted by The Moth’s Director of Finance, Marina Klutse. Check out the extras for this episode on our website to see photos of Maurice as a child and to hear more from his interview with Marina.

Hosted by: Marina Klutse

Storyteller: Maurice Ashley
